headline: I successfully defended my Ph.D. thesis. Many thanks to Fabian Suchanek and Mathieu d'Aquin for been my examiner and Matthias Nickles for supervising me!
I joined the Genesys AI Group in Galway, Ireland
Our paper 'Facilitating Prediction of Adverse Drug Reactions by Using Knowledge Graphs and Multi-Label Learning Models' has been accepted at Briefings in Bioinformatics 2017
Our paper 'Regularizing Neural Knowledge Graph Embeddings via Equivalence and Inversion Axioms' has been accepted at ECML-PKDD 2017 (acceptance rate of 27%)
Our paper 'Mining Cardinalities from Knowledge Bases' has been accepted at DEXA 2017
Our paper 'Identifying Equivalent Relation Paths in Knowledge Graphs' has been accepted at LDK 2017
